label: 藤原実範
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (dates unknown, eleventh century). Father of Suetsuna. Kanshi in Honchō mudaishi 本朝無題詩(14), Chūyū ki burui shihai kanshishū 中右記部類紙背漢詩集 (2), and Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集 (1). Compositions in Honchō zoku monzui 本朝続文粋(9), Sanjūgo bunshū. [季綱、漢詩、三十五文集]
